name: Farmit
description:
Farm to your hearts content in this fun little puzzle game with hand tailored levels, where you play as a farmer looking to beautify these small islands with bountiful patches of flowers.

 

Listen to the relaxing sounds of farming and ocean waves.

⬆️⬇️➡️⬅️ = Move

R = Reset

Enter = Next

Backspace = Exit

Programmer: AGuyLikeMatt
Artist: EM54
Musician: Bradymuthmusic
Cael: Cael

Wysteria Games

Help support us by joining our Patreon for $5/month to get this and all of our paid games for free, along with exclusive benefits!
